FuncDef: The display dragonfly abs-pfc statistics command displays the statistics on PFC frames in dragonfly antilocking PFC. The display dragonfly abs-pfc statistics command displays the statistics on PFC frames in dragonfly antilocking PFC. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to view statistics on PFC frames in dragonfly antilocking PFC.
